bug.author: whitecosmos1996
bug.summary: RuntimeError: Error(s) in loading state_dict for Darknet
bug.description: I have uninstalled the old pytorch and made sure to reinstall the latest version, but the above error still appears. How can I fix itï¼Ÿ

comments.comment: python detect.py --data-cfg data/classification.data --cfg cfg/yolov3.cfg --weights weights/latest.pt I ran the above script, and the magic happened: no error was reported.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/whitecosmos1996>@whitecosmos1996</denchmark-link> great, so it seems you resolved the issue on your own? I will close, please reopen if needed.

I ran into the same issue, but I realized that I am missing the --cfg flag update. You will need to update the cfg files with respect to the model you use for inference. Updating the flag solved this RuntimeError
